alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 02 at 3:38PM PDT until August 02 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL INYO COUNTY... At 338 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms produced heavy rain along Emigrant Canyon Road south of Stovepipe Wells. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Stovepipe Wells and Emigrant Canyon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
